definition: army of Zhao 趙國|赵国 during the Warring States
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms

sentences.english: Following the briefing, Zhao Jun and Cui Tiankai took questions from the journalists.
sentences.chinese: 介紹情況後，趙軍和崔天凱回答了記者的提問。

sentences.english: Zhao made me feel a links also praised the spirit up.
sentences.chinese: 趙軍的一通吹捧讓我覺得自己也精神起來。

sentences.english: As a result, they were surrounded by the army of Qin till the supplies were exhausted.
sentences.chinese: 結果，趙軍被秦軍包圍，直至彈盡糧絕。

sentences.english: Do you remember the location of Zhao camp?
sentences.chinese: 可還記得趙軍駐紮的地點？
